data.message:
Bro thar was a rapper on da tech9 6s and 7s tour back in 2011 who was the realest. He performed as EMJ. His name Mike Jones he a King from WATTS.... 
Ya he was murdered after the june 26th show at the knitting factory in Reno.. You wouda recognize his talent you two woulda hit it off.... Ya Mike had a lot to do... Mike said it was Kutt Calhoun who brought them punks to Mike... But we all missed out.....
Hey Ima fan and appreciate you!
